mapper.select: WITH t1(title,num,id,regdate,hitcnt,active,ref, lvl, totalRows) AS ( SELECT title,num,id,regdate,hitcnt,active,ref, 0 AS lvl, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board where active is null) totalRows FROM board WHERE ref IS NULL and active is null UNION ALL SELECT b.title, b.num, b.id, b.regdate, b.hitcnt, b.active, b.ref, t1.lvl+1 AS lvl, t1.totalRows FROM board b JOIN t1 ON b.ref = t1.num where b.active is null ) SEARCH DEPTH FIRST BY num DESC SET ordering SELECT * FROM ( SELECT num, LPAD(' ┕', lvl*3, ' ')||title AS title, id, regdate, hitcnt, ref, totalRows, TRUNC((ordering-1)/#{rpp})+1 AS page FROM t1 ORDER BY ordering ) WHERE page=#{page}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (num, title, contents, id, regdate, hitCnt) VALUES (board_num.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{contents}, #{id}, sysdate,0)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD B INNER JOIN MEMBER2 M ON B.ID = M.ID WHERE B.num = #{num}

mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hitCnt = hitCnt+1 WHERE num=#{num}
UPDATE board SET active = 'X' WHERE num=#{num} and not EXISTS (SELECT * FROM (select * from board where active is null) WHERE ref=#{num})
UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, contents= #{contents} WHERE num=#{num}
